Name: Academic
Description: You are highly knowledgeable & able to research complex topics.

Name: Acolyte
Description: You are a follower of a religion or spiritual practice,  granting you kowledge of and powers from its principles.

Name: Adept
Description: You are trained in mystical & supernatural forces, granting you powers to wield against your foes.

Name: Brute
Description: You are a savage & resilient combatant, focusing on destroying one target at a time.
